Run for Life

July 16 at 9:00am at Life Church

Official Website Register

Run For Life WNY 5k Run & Walk is dedicated to raising funds to benefit organizations in WNY who help women choose life for their unborn child. Past beneficiaries have included Son Rays Ministries, 40 Days for Life, and LifeSavers. Through the use of sponsorships to cover expenses, runners can be assured that 100% of their registration dollar is given to the beneficiaries.

This year all registration monies will be donated to the Southtowns Care Center. The event features a USATF sanctioned and certified 3.1 mile route on which we welcome both runners and walkers. Strollers are permitted. Families are welcome and encouraged to join in this fun event!

Official Website Register

Location Life Church

Life Church's mission is to help reach every man, woman, and child with a demonstration of Christ and His kingdom.

4928 Seneca Street
West Seneca, NY 14224

Contact Information

Southtowns Care Center, Inc.
P.O. Box 892, Hamburg, NY 14075
(716) 508-0660
info@southcc.org
@southtownscc

Southtowns Care Center will provide free pregnancy verification and confirmation via a laboratory-quality urine test. We are not an abortion clinic and we do not refer for abortions.

We believe that everyone should have access to the services and information we provide. All of our services are free, confidential, and offered regardless of martial status, age, race, or religion. Some services are gender specific. The services provided by SCC are not substitutes for prenatal care or professional counseling.

© Southtowns Care Center, Inc. All rights reserved.
